Uses of Class
alluxio.security.authorization.Permission

  • Packages that use Permission 
    Package Description
    alluxio.security.authorization  
    alluxio.underfs.options  

    • Uses of Permission in alluxio.security.authorization

      Methods in alluxio.security.authorization that return Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Permission Permission.applyDirectoryUMask()
      Applies the default umask for newly created directories to the mode bits.
      Permission Permission.applyFileUMask()
      Applies the default umask for newly created files to the mode bits.
      Permission Permission.applyUMask(Mode umask)
      Applies umask to the mode bits.
      static Permission Permission.defaults()
      Creates the default Permission for a file or a directory.
      Permission Permission.setMode(Mode mode)
      Sets the Mode.
      Permission Permission.setMode(short mode)
      Sets the Mode.
      Permission Permission.setOwnerFromLoginModule()
      Sets the owner based on the login module and updates the group to the primary group of the owner.
      Permission Permission.setOwnerFromThriftClient()
      Sets the owner based on the thrift transport and updates the group to the primary group of the owner.
      Constructors in alluxio.security.authorization with parameters of type Permission 
      Constructor and Description
      Permission(Permission p)
      Constructs an instance of Permission cloned from the given permission.

      Permission CreateOptions.getPermission()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the permission.
      CreateOptions CreateOptions.setPermission(Permission permission)
      Sets the permission.
